sentences.en: ‘Let's get this show on the road—we're late already.’.
sentences.cn: “我们开始干 吧——我们已经晚了”。

sentences.en: a year later, he had nothing to show for his efforts.
sentences.cn: 一年之后，他的努力一点也没有成效。

sentences.en: A young Moroccan stopped by police refused to show his papers.
sentences.cn: 一位被警察拦下的摩洛哥青年拒绝出示他的证件。

sentences.en: During each show we will be raffling a fabulous prize.
sentences.cn: 每场表演期间，我们将以抽彩方法送出大奖。

sentences.en: Figures showed a 9% rise in inflation.
sentences.cn: 数据显示通货膨胀上升了9%。

sentences.en: Gary has shown his faith in the club’s future by agreeing to stay on.
sentences.cn: 加里同意留下，表明了他对这家俱乐部的未来有信心。

sentences.en: I enjoyed the show immensely.
sentences.cn: 我非常喜欢这场演出。

sentences.en: I want a photograph that shows his face.
sentences.cn: 我要一张能够看清他的脸的照片。

sentences.en: If you keep your eyes squeezed shut, you'llmiss the show.
sentences.cn: 如果一直紧闭双眼，你就要错过精彩的表演了。

sentences.en: It just goes to show (= proves ) how much people judge each other on how they look.
sentences.cn: 这恰恰证明人们相互之间经常就是以貌取人。

sentences.en: It was the sound a man might make when in pain but trying not to show it.
sentences.cn: 那是一个人强忍着疼痛不愿表露出来时发出的声音。

sentences.en: It was time now to show more political realism.
sentences.cn: 现在是拿出更多政治务实精神的时候了。

sentences.en: It was very good of you to come. Let me show you to my study.
sentences.cn: 你能来真是太好了。让我带你看我的书房。

sentences.en: Leshka waved him away with a show of irritation.
sentences.cn: 廖什克恼火地挥手让他离开。

sentences.en: Mary showed great interest in the children.
sentences.cn: 玛丽对这些小孩子表示出极大的兴趣。

sentences.en: Milton was shown into the office.
sentences.cn: 米尔顿被领进了办公室。

sentences.en: Our therapists will show you how to clear your mind of worries.
sentences.cn: 我们的治疗师会教你如何消除心中的忧虑。

sentences.en: Perry was the star of the show .
sentences.cn: 佩里是这台演出的明星。

sentences.en: she had been up in court and was so ashamed she could hardly show her face.
sentences.cn: 她曾经出庭，非常羞愧，几乎不敢露面。

sentences.en: she had been up in court and was so ashamed she could hardly show her face.
sentences.cn: 她曾经出庭，非常羞愧，几乎不敢露面。

sentences.en: She had learned not to show her emotions .
sentences.cn: 她早就学会了不流露出自己的感情。

sentences.en: She shook her fist. "I'll show you," she said.
sentences.cn: 她挥了挥拳头，“我要让你看看，”她说。

sentences.en: Show me which one you like and I'll buy it for you.
sentences.cn: 指给我看你喜欢哪个，我给你买。

sentences.en: The evening show was terrible, with hesitant unsure performances from all.
sentences.cn: 晚上的演出很糟，所有人都缩手缩脚，显得很不自信。

sentences.en: The ideas in the show's presentation were good, but failed in execution.
sentences.cn: 那场展览陈述的想法很好，但是没能实现。

sentences.en: The man grinned, showing bad teeth.
sentences.cn: 那男人咧着嘴笑，露出一口坏牙。

sentences.en: The map shows the main rivers of the region.
sentences.cn: 这张地图上标示出了该地区的主要河流。

sentences.en: The new treatment has been shown to reduce the number of deaths.
sentences.cn: 这种新疗法被证明可以减少死亡人数。

sentences.en: The Polish economy began to show signs of recovery.
sentences.cn: 波兰的经济开始出现复苏的迹象。

sentences.en: The results show the level of frustration among hospital doctors.
sentences.cn: 这些结果显示了医院医生的不满程度。

sentences.en: The show starts at 7:30 pm.
sentences.cn: 演出晚上7点30分开始。

sentences.en: They have a tendency to show off, to dramatize almost every situation.
sentences.cn: 他们爱炫耀，几乎对每种情况都添油加醋。

sentences.en: They’ve come to town to see a Broadway show.
sentences.cn: 他们到城里来看一场百老汇演出。

sentences.en: Think positively and show some determination.
sentences.cn: 要往好的方面想，拿出决心来。

sentences.en: This show, too, was virtually sold out before it opened.
sentences.cn: 这场演出的门票也是几乎在开演前就销售一空了。

sentences.en: Who do you suppose will replace her on the show?
sentences.cn: 你觉得谁会代替她参加这场演出？

sentences.en: Would they forgive and forget — or show him the door?
sentences.cn: 他们会既往不咎吗——还是会对他下逐客令呢？

words.tran_cn: 表演技巧；吸引观众的窍门
展出；炫耀，卖弄（show的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 同 all over the place (见 all)

phrases.phrase: get (或 keep) the show on the road
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)开始干起来，付诸实施

phrases.phrase: good (或 bad 或 poor) show!
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式，旧)干得好（或不好）；真棒（或糟糕）！
（在工作或经历方面）有（或无）成绩可言

phrases.phrase: show (someone) a clean pair of heels

phrases.tran_cn: 娱乐业；娱乐性行业（等于showbiz）
(律)陈述（申请或豁免一项程序或惩罚的）理由
才艺表演会；业余演出比赛

trans.tran_en: a performance for the public, especially one that includes singing, dancing, or jokes
If you show someone to a room or seat, you lead them there

trans.tran_cn: 表明，展示，解说，指出，带领
trans.tran_en: to explain to someone how to do something, by doing it yourself or using actions to help them learn

trans.tran_cn: 显现， 显露， 露面； 演出， 放映
trans.tran_en: to let your feelings, attitudes, or personal qualities be clearly seen

trans.tran_cn: 给看，显示，出示；引领，带领；教，告知，说明；表明，证明
